snippet: Human Rights Watch said it had documented for the first time that Syrian rebel groups targeted civilians in Latakia for executions and hostage-taking. More than 200 people were still being held, the agency said.
lead_paragraph: Human Rights Watch said it had documented for the first time that Syrian rebel groups targeted civilians in Latakia for executions and hostage-taking. More than 200 people were still being held, the agency said.
